column4: Is any one willing to do a remote desktop and help me with getting the visual effect to work on ubuntu 7.10 with a ati video card
ok if you go into restricted drivers manager, is the ati driver installed?
yes
and if you go to system -> preferences -> appearance on the effects tab
and you check the middle box.. what happens?
no it will not let me enable them
they are greyed out?
no i can click on them but a box comes up saying Desktop effect could not be enabled
then its not available for your computer
why not
because your hardware doesnt support it.. or for a bunch of reasons, ubuntu has determined that it cant run it on your computer
one other thing.. did you restart after you installed the ati drivers?

yes
and ati makes very poor drivers for linux...
oh
so no eye candy for me :(
